title: Online Library Education Design: Blended Learning Strategies for Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic library utilization experience and elementary understanding of mathematical resource retrieval
context.additional_context: Program for pre-service mathematics teachers focusing on curriculum-linked resource exploration and evaluation using online library systems.

learning_goals: Within two weeks, learners can independently navigate academic journal articles, statistical databases, and digital mathematics educational resources on online library platforms
Through asynchronous learning modules, learners can create a three-step checklist evaluating the credibility and appropriateness of academic materials
In real-time online sessions, learners can collaborate with peers to present customized resource collection strategies for mathematics education scenarios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
